name: Twilight Fangs
summary: Vampires and humans have coexisted for many generations now. United in their fight against the werewolf menace, an uneasy alliance has been formed between the two races. Times seem peaceful now and as a college student, things seemed to be going smoothly. However, one day on the way home, you and your vampire friend Rayleigh come across a mysterious man named Vice who’s been injured. You try to help him, but he disappears before you can call an ambulance.
